messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the focus of the text regarding common faith?
The methods, practices, and dogma of differing sects appear to be noticeably at odds with one another.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the public body established by a minority of sects?
The Esoteric Order of Dagon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the ominous sight described to Cyaegha?
A gigantic eye staring down at them, with darkness and tentacles emanating from it
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who wrote the passage describing Cyaegha's ominous sight?
Eddy C. Bertin, from the book 'Darkness, My Name Is'
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Cyaegha's form?
an enormous black mass with one huge spherical green eye
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does Cyaegha appear to others?
a gigantic eye staring down at them
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is happening around Cyaegha?
the sky split; deep clefts opened through which darkness began to ooze
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is Cyaegha considered a significant entity?
it remains to be seen if such internal schism will end in confrontation
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the enormous black mass in the story?
Cyaegha
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is Cyaegha's resting place located?
A remote part of western Germany
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is worshiped by the residents of a small village in western Germany?
Cyaegha
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Cyaegha's primary concern?
The day of its release
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage dealt by Cyaegha in a combat situation?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of Cyaegha's armor?
takes minimum damage from impaling weapons and bullets
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when Cyaegha reaches 0 hit points?
retreats or reforms underground
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much sanity loss is incurred to see Cyaegha?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Cyaegha when it reaches 0 hit points?
Cyaegha retreats or reforms underground.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What spells can the Keeper use on Cyaegha?
Whatever Call/Dismiss or Contact spells the Keeper wishes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of seeing Cyaegha on a person's sanity?
1D10/1D100 Sanity points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the curse said to afflict those living in isolated areas where Cyaegha worship exists?
A terrible curse that can possess the unwary and convert them to Cyaegha's cause.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the purpose of the coven's diabolic rites?
Their diabolic rites were meant to syphon-off the god's energies for their own benefit.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the outcome for those who practiced this inverted form of worship?
The tales speak of a terrible, yet unnamed, doom that came to those who practiced this inverted form of worship.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be described about Daoloth?
Not shapeless, but so complex that the eye could recognise no describable shape.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What characteristics were associated with Daoloth?
There were hemispheres and shining metal.
